title: I'm about to cry.
body:
Ok so I was in promos. In my first promo match in the champ select I was telling everyone hi how are you. Just to lift the mood etc..

As soon as we spawn a Morgana says "hi I don't like people who are nice so I'm going to troll" she then walks into the turrets all game and gives them kills :(

We lost and I was upset so I queued again only to have the Morgana on the team again :( she says hi Alfie I'm going to troll again. I then dodge the queue and lost my promotions :(

Honestly though, the Morgana was likely offended by your FAKE STORY. Your match history shows you haven't been matched with a morgana for ages, also you're on 0LP so you weren't in any promos.
